name: 天の声
text:
『三峰さんが最近ハマっていることは？』
──オープン！
trans:
"What is Mitsumine-san into lately?"
──Open!

name: 天の声
text: 『料理』！
trans: "Cooking"!

name: 恋鐘
text:
結華が料理にハマっとるとは
知らんかったばい……！
trans:
I didn't know you've gotten into cookin' lately,
Yuika...!

name: 摩美々
text: 意外すぎでしょー
trans: That came out of the blue.

name: 咲耶
text:
そうだね……
正直なところ、思いもよらなかった
trans:
I agree...
To tell you the truth, it didn't even cross my mind.

name: 結華
text:
ごめ～ん……！
そんな気はしたんだけどさぁ、他に何もなくて！
trans:
Sorry～! I thought so too, but there was nothing
else I could think of!

name: 恋鐘
text: 霧子はなんでわかったと？
trans: How'dya know, Kiriko?

name: 霧子
text:
この前……
スーパーで……会って……
trans:
The other day... 
we met... at the supermarket...

name: 霧子
text:
おうちで……クッキーを作るって……
だから……
trans:
And she said... she was making cookies...
at home... so...

name: 摩美々
text:
へー
どういう心境の変化ぁ？
trans:
Huuuh.
What's gotten into you?

name: 結華
text:
やー、だってさぁ
こがたんの料理食べてたら舌が肥えるじゃん
trans:
Well, I mean, don't you get picky with food
after eating Kogatan's cooking?

name: 結華
text:
だから三峰ももうちょっとなんか作れるようになりたいな？
って思って
trans:
So Mitsumine thought it'd be good if she can
make something nice too.

name: 結華
text:
ハマってるっていうか練習中ってだけなんだけど
最近ちょっと頑張ってみていたので……
trans:
It's more like practice than being really into cooking,
though. But I've been working at it recently...

name: 恋鐘
text: んふふ～
trans: Nfufu～

name: 恋鐘
text:
うまかもんが食べたか～って
頑張るとは、よかことばい！
trans:
Doin' your best cuz ya wanna eat somethin' nice is
a good thiing!

name: 恋鐘
text: クッキー、上手くできたと～？
trans: So did your cookies turn out nice～?

name: 結華
text:
うーん……まずくはなかったけど……
多少粉っぽかったかな……
trans:
Hmm... They didn't taste bad, but...
they were kind of powdery, I guess...

name: 結華
text:
もうちょっと美味しく作れるようになったら
みんなも食べて～
trans:
Once I make them taste a bit better
you all can try them out too～

name: 天の声
text:
『田中さんが今欲しいものは？』
──オープン！
trans:
"What does Tanaka-san want right now?"
──Open!

name: 天の声
text: 『フトアゴヒゲトカゲのぬいぐるみ』！
trans: "Central Bearded Dragon Plush Toy"

name: 天の声
text: 月岡さんの『トカゲのぬいぐるみ』は正解とします！
trans: Tsukioka-san's answer, "Lizard Plush Toy", is correct!

name: 咲耶
text:
あの質問も……
私は見当違いな答えを書いてしまったな……
trans:
That question too...
I wrote something completely off base...

name: 摩美々
text: まぁ、教えてなかったしー
trans: Well, I didn't tell you about it.

name: 摩美々
text:
っていうか、恋鐘に当てられたのが
ビックリだったんですケド
trans: Anyways, I'm shocked you guessed it right, Kogane.

name: 恋鐘
text:
……？
摩美々、お菓子のシール集めとったやろ？
trans:
......?
But Mamimi, you've been collectin'
stickers from snack packages, right?

name: 恋鐘
text:
賞品、トカゲっぽいぬいぐるみやったし、
欲しかとかな～って
trans:
The prize was some sort of lizard plush,
so I was all thinkin' that you wanted it～

name: 恋鐘
text:
うちいくつかシール取っといたけん
それも渡さんばね～
trans:
I saved a few of 'em stickers too,
so I'll give 'em to you!

name: 摩美々
text: ……後で頂きまぁす
trans: ...I'll take them later.

name: 咲耶
text: 言ってくれれば私も集めたのに
trans: I would've collected them too if you told me.

name: 摩美々
text: 別にそこまでじゃないからぁ
trans: You don't have to go that far.

name: 恋鐘
text:
ふえ……！？
いらんかった！？
trans:
Fweh...!?
You don't need 'em!?

name: 摩美々
text: ……や、いらなくはないんだケド……
trans: ...No, it's not like I don't need them...

name: 結華
text: 照れくさいんだよねぇ
trans: You're just embarrassed, huh?

name: 摩美々
text:
フォローっぽくフォローじゃないこと言うの
やめてもらえますー？
trans:
Could you stop saying stuff that sounds like
you're helping but you're actually not?

name: 結華
text: あはは、バレたか
trans: Ahaha, you got me.

name: 霧子
text:
わたしも……集めるね……
摩美々ちゃん……
trans:
I'll start... collecting them too...
Mamimi-chan...

name: 摩美々
text: ほんと、そんなやる気出さなくていいからぁ……
trans: Honestly, you don't need to do this much for me...

name: 天の声
text:
『幽谷さんが最近植え替えをしたお花は？』
──オープン！
trans:
"Which flower did Yukoku-san recently transplant?"
──Open!

name: 天の声
text: 『ミニバラ』！
trans: "Miniature Rose"

name: 天の声
text:
──おっとこれは惜しかった……！
白瀬さん以外は答えが揃いました！
trans:
──Oh dear, this was a close one...!
Everyone except Shirase-san got the same answer!

name: 霧子
text:
ミニバラさんが……事務所に来たのは……
最近で……
trans:
Mini Rose-san... only came to the office...
recently...

name: 霧子
text:
ふふ……
今度……紹介するね……
trans:
Fufu...
I'll introduce you.. next time...

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、もちろん
ぜひ会わせてほしい
trans:
Yes, of course.
I can't wait to meet her.

name: 恋鐘
text:
もう少ししたらきれか～って咲く予定ばい！
ね、霧子！
trans:
She's about to bloom all purdy real soon!
Right, Kiriko!?

name: 霧子
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: 結華
text: まみみんもよく覚えてたねぇ
trans: Mamimin, you remembered it too, huh?

name: 摩美々
text:
……水やり見てたし
たまたまぁ
trans:
...I saw her water it.
Just a coincidence.

name: 咲耶
text: ──と、他にも質問はあったけれど……
trans:
──and there were a few other questions we missed,
but...

name: 咲耶
text:
今日は、みんなの知らない一面を
より知ることができた一日だった
trans:
...today's the day I could see a new side from each of
you that I've never known before.

name: 咲耶
text: 私は特に、驚かされてばかりだったよ
trans: And it was full of surprises for me, especially.

name: 恋鐘
text:
それもそうたい！
今日は新情報がば～り出た日！
trans:
That's true! Today's a day when looots of new
info came out!

name: 咲耶
text:
ああ、そんな記念日だ──
ここは私持ちということでどうだろう
trans:
Yes, a day to be commemorated indeed──
As such, may I offer to treat you all today?

name: 結華
text: ちょいちょーい、なんでそうなる～？
trans: Now hold up a minute, where are you going with this～?

name: 咲耶
text: なんでも何も
trans: Whatever do you mean?

name: 咲耶
text:
私には、豪華賞品を得る機会を
何度も逃がしてしまった罪があるだろう？
trans:
I have to assume responsibility for all the times
I've failed to win us the grand prize, don't I?

name: 結華
text:
まったく、記念日とか言ってそれが本音だな～？
やめやめ、年下に出させるほど落ちぶれてませんから！
trans:
Good grief, you call this a commemoration, but that's
just how you reaaally feel, huh? Yeah, no. I'm not so
far gone as to let someone younger pay MY bill!

name: 恋鐘
text:
そうばい、咲耶は気にしすぎ～！ 
そいは罪じゃなか！
trans:
That's right, you worry too much, Sakuya～!
There's nothin' to be ashamed of!

name: 恋鐘
text:
次回の楽しみが増えただけやもん！
結華も言いよったやろ？
trans:
It just means we've got somethin' to look forward
to next time! Yuika said it herself, didn't she?

name: 咲耶
text: それはもちろん、そうなのだけれど──
trans: Of course, that is true, but──

name: 霧子
text: 咲耶さん……？
trans: Sakuya-san...?

name: 咲耶
text:
──……いや、すまない
考えすぎはよくなかった
trans:
──...No, I'm sorry.
I shouldn't get hung up on it too much.

name: 咲耶
text:
お言葉に甘えて
今はただ、喜びを受け止めることにするよ
trans:
I'll accept your kind sentiments and
only focus on enjoying this day fully.

name: 咲耶
text: そちらのケーキも美味しそうだね
trans: Those cakes over there look delicious.

name: 摩美々
text: んー
trans: Mm-hmm.

name: 咲耶
text:
──けれど、そろそろ箸休めに
しょっぱいものを入れた方がいいだろうか……
trans:
──However, I think it's about time to cleanse
my palate with something savory...

name: 咲耶
text: 摩美々はどう思う？
trans: What do you think Mamimi?

name: 摩美々
text: ……それは、咲耶のお腹と相談なんじゃないー？
trans: ...Shouldn't you be asking your own stomach that?

name: 咲耶
text: フフ、それもそうだ
trans: Fufu, I suppose that's true.

name: 咲耶
text: ……ねぇ、摩美々
trans: ...Hey, Mamimi.

name: 咲耶
text:
今日の収録のことなのだけれど
実は、少し……ショックでね
trans:
It's about today's recording.
The truth is... I'm a bit shocked.

name: 咲耶
text:
……私は、みんなをよく知っているつもりでいたけれど
まだまだ、全然だったんだって──
trans:
...I thought that I knew each of you well enough,
but it seems I'm not there yet──

name: 咲耶
text: そう言われた気がして……
trans: I feel like that's been made clear to me today...

name: 摩美々
text: ……や、それはぁ
trans: ...No, that's...

name: 咲耶
text:
──なんて
すまない、単なるぼやきだよ
trans:
──It's nothing.
Sorry, I was merely talking to myself.

name: 咲耶
text:
うん、やはりしょっぱいものが欲しいな
さっき向こうに炊き込みご飯があったんだ
trans:
Yes, I think I'd like to eat something savory now.
I spotted some mixed fried rice on that side.

name: 咲耶
text: 摩美々の分も取るかい？
trans: Shall I take some for you too, Mamimi?

name: 摩美々
text: ……んー
trans: ...Mm-hmm.
